attributes.action: Make the roads car worthy,as cars have to be road worthy.Pot holes are dangerous
attributes.additional_details: Fix the roads, too many cars are getting damaged
attributes.background: Get all councils to fix the roads, as they are becoming like a 3rd world country roads.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fix Our Roads: National Plan on Dangerous Potholes Now
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739014
